publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-3088 Chris Ballance: Nuclear Non-Proliferation Treaty—That the Parliament welcomes the opening statement from the UK delegation to the Non-Proliferation Treaty Review Conference at the United Nations on 5 May 2005 of “our unequivocal undertaking to accomplish the elimination of nuclear arsenals”; recognises that such a worthy commitment is incompatible with plans to build a successor to the existing Trident nuclear missile system, and calls on the UK Government to abandon any such plans. Supported by: Shiona Baird*, Richard Lochhead*, Patrick Harvie*, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Robin Harper*, Alex Neil*, Eleanor Scott*, Mark Ballard*
S2M-3088 Nuclear Non-Proliferation Treaty (lodged on 6 July 2005) Ms Sandra White*, Christine Grahame*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-3088 Nuclear Non-Proliferation Treaty (lodged on 6 July 2005) Mr Stewart Maxwell*
S2M-3088 Nuclear Non-Proliferation Treaty (lodged on 6 July 2005) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-3088 Nuclear Non-Proliferation Treaty (lodged on 6 July 2005) Tommy Sheridan*
